SEARCH
Package Poised.Utils

Class BaseManager<Table_Type,Table_Properties>

java.lang.Object
Poised.Utils.BaseManager<Table_Type,Table_Properties>
Type Parameters:
Table_Type - The Table Managed by the Manager.
Table_Properties - The Table's Properties.
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddressesManager, ArchitectsManager, BuildingsManager, ContractorsManager, CustomersManager, PersonalDetailsManager, ProjectManagersManager, ProjectsManager, StructuralEngineersManager
public abstract class BaseManager<Table_Type,Table_Properties> extends Object
An Abstract Base Class for managing the Interactions Between a Database Table and the User.

    • BaseManager

      public BaseManager(DatabaseManager databaseManager, DialogueManager dialogueManager, BaseTableManager<Table_Type> tableManager, String tableName)
      Constructor for BaseManager.
      Parameters:
      databaseManager - The Database Manager that will Handle all the database Interactions.
      dialogueManager - The Dialogue Manager that will Handle all the dialogue Interactions.
      tableManager - The Manager for the Table Manipulations.
      tableName - The Name of the Table Managed by the Manager.
